Room.Name: Roland's Royal Fighting Academy
Room.ShortDescription: Welcome brave warriors to Roland's Royal Fighting Academy, where we will train you to be real knights to prepare for service with the Lyanden Castle.
Room.LongDescription: Roland's Academy trains all the knights that wish to eventually enter the services of Lyanden Castle. Warriors coming here for the first time should enter the green door to advance to the level of Punisher. A Punisher should enter the blue door to advance to Punisher, Second Class. Finally, a Punisher, Second Class should enter the red door to complete your training at Roland's Royal Fighting Academy.
